title: [Bug][Mac] Shake to find mouse cursor freeze the game
body: The feature that allow you to shake the mouse to make the cursor bigger and find it easily in the screen introduced in macOS El Captain freeze the game... The is particularly annoying when it happen in-game because the only way to unfreeze the game is to alt+tab and this can be long if you play in fullscreen instead of borderless.

replies.body: Hey any update on this issue? I've only played 2 games in the past few weeks but both games I've experienced this, which has severely limited what champs I can play, since anyone with a skill shot is almost impossible to play...

Did this only happened recently and this feature has worked in previous patches, or this has always happened with the feature? The reason I ask is because the mouse in League is hard-coded (can't be modified), so I'm not sure a feature like this would work properly in-game without causing huge issues under most circumstances.

Hi,
This is a feature of macOS, not League of Legends !
I've noticed it ever since I got my MacBook Pro in early December.
And this feature is interfering with the game cursor causing it to crash.
Can you disable the feature and see if the issue persists?

Yes it does... but since it's enable by default it's still a big issue Riot should fix.
Also the setting is hidden deep inside the "accessibility" panel and very few people will think to look for it there.
